categories: Category:Battles of the Eternal Empire conquest

nodes.text: The Invasion of Darvannis occurred in the early stage of the Eternal Empire conquest of the known galaxy. Of little interest to both Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, Darvannis was only defended by mercenary forces hired by the Hutt Cartel. The Eternal Fleet easily drove them away and claimed the planet for Eternal Empire. A factory was constructed on world that produced ships, weapons and Skytrooper droid forces for the Enernal Empire.
The Invasion of Darvannis is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire in the codex entry obtained during Chapter 14: Mandalore the Avenger.
